text.config.gelatin.title: Gelatin Config
text.config.gelatin.option.addCustomJson: Whether or not Jello will add it's included 1822 colors to Minecraft internally.
text.config.gelatin.option.enableDyeingB: Allow for the dyeing of blocks using any vanilla dye.
text.config.gelatin.option.enableDyeingE: Allow for the dyeing of entities using any dye.
text.config.gelatin.option.enableDyeingP: Allow for the dyeing of players using any dye.
text.config.gelatin.option.enableGraySca: Used to allow for true color when a entity is dyed or color.
Used to allow for true color when a entity is rainbow effected.
text.config.gelatin.option.enableTranspa: Enables a fix for water within cauldrons just being Opaque rather than translucent.
text.config.gelatin.option.gelatinBlackL: Used to Blacklist mods from allowing Gelatin to change its entities encase of Rendering issues
text.config.gelatin.category.dyeingContr: Options to change how dyeing works for the user
text.config.gelatin.option.dyeingControl: Alternative Controls instead of using shift by default
Alternative to constantly hold down a button to Color using Dye tools.
Whether dyeing should be on by default or not when joining a world.
